Question: In 2001 this person was given a Lifetime Achievement Award at the 15th Annual American Comedy Awards.
Hints: On June 24 The New York Times printed an op-ed piece on this person by Jerry Seinfeld.
In the 1960s, this person began appearing on television variety shows, notably The Ed Sullivan Show and The Tonight Show.
This person and his "Seven Dirty Words" comedy routine were central to the 1978 U.S Supreme Court case F.C.C.
